description: Square array a(n,k) read by antidiagonals: a(n,1)=1, a(1,k)=1, a(n,k)=1+a(n-1,k-1)+a(n-1,k)+a(n,k-1).
maple: A047671 := proc(n,k) option remember; if n = 1 then 1; elif k = 1 then 1; else 1+A047671(n-1,k-1)+A047671(n,k-1)+A047671(n-1,k); fi; end;
mathematica: nmax = 12; a[_, 1] = 1; a[1, _] = 1; a[n_ /; n > 1, k_ /; k > 1] :=  a[n, k] = 1 + a[n-1, k-1] + a[n-1, k] + a[n, k-1]; Flatten[ Table[ a[n-k , k], {n, 1, nmax}, {k, 1, n-1}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 19 2012 *)
